quote_first: The crime was reported to us (with almost indecent alacrity, Rog) at
quote_last: , by Susan Trott - of Black Grouse Cottage - who had been, I quote: 'out looking for hedgehogs when I was horrified to notice the postbox door had fallen off and was just lying there, on the ground'.
title: Burley Cross Postbox Theft
author: Nicola Barker
